Fourierorbitdarstellung¶

class +AMrotorSIM.+Graphs.@Fourierorbitdarstellung.Fourierorbitdarstellung(a, experiment)¶

Bases: handle

FOURIERORBITDARSTELLUNG Class for visualisation of the orbit that is developed from the fourier transform and inverse fourier transform of the results of the time integration This class’s method plot requires the Matlab curve fitting toolbox.

time = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.Experiments.Stationaere_Lsg AMrotorSIM.Experiments.Hochlaufanalyse

experiment = None¶

See also AMrotorTools.PlotColors

+AMrotorSIM.+Graphs.@Fourierorbitdarstellung.plot()¶

main method for the user plot(self,sensors,Ordnung) Ordnung = order of FourierFit This function requires the Matlab curve fitting toolbox.

+AMrotorSIM.+Graphs.@Fourierorbitdarstellung.private.FourierFit(time, signal, Drehzahl, Ordnung)¶
